com.soa.delegate
Interface HandlerContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultHandlerContext
public interface HandlerContext

Provides context for a message exchange to be delivered through application and classloader boundaries.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getBindingIdentifier()
          Returns the UDDI binding identifier of the service being invoked.
 java.lang.String getBindingURI()
          Returns the type of binding (SOAP 1.1, SOAP 1.2, HTTP, etc.) being used (if any).
 javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler getCategoryCallback(java.lang.String categoryName)
          Given a category URI String, returns a CallbackHandler that will provide the required credentials through Callbacks.
 java.lang.String getInterfaceName()
          Returns the name of the interface being invoked.
 java.lang.String getOperationName()
          Returns the name of the operation being invoked.
 java.lang.String getServiceName()
          Returns the name of the service being invoked.
 java.util.Set getSubjectCategories()
          Returns a Set of subject category URI's as Strings.
 

Method Detail

getServiceName

java.lang.String getServiceName()
Returns the name of the service being invoked.

Returns:
String representation of the service QName. null if service is referenced by binding identifier instead.

java.lang.String getBindingIdentifier()
Returns the UDDI binding identifier of the service being invoked.

Returns:
String identifier of the service. null if service is referenced by QName instead.

Returns the name of the interface being invoked.

Returns:

getOperationName

java.lang.String getOperationName()
Returns the name of the operation being invoked.

Returns:

getBindingURI

java.lang.String getBindingURI()
Returns the type of binding (SOAP 1.1, SOAP 1.2, HTTP, etc.) being used (if any).

Returns:
String URI of the type of binding, null if not specified.

getSubjectCategories

java.util.Set getSubjectCategories()
Returns a Set of subject category URI's as Strings.

Returns:
Set of String URI's.

getCategoryCallback

javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler getCategoryCallback(java.lang.String categoryName)
Given a category URI String, returns a CallbackHandler that will provide the required credentials through Callbacks.

Parameters:
categoryName - String URI of the credential category.
Returns:
CallbackHandler that can satisfy any Callback requests.
